name: Escape from Bytesville
description:
This is an action, quest and platformer single player game set in the town of Bytesville!

You've woken up in Bytesville hospital with memory loss and a strange feeling that you have to get out of this town! Interact with over 60 townsfolk, find the keys and earn money to upgrade your weapons to help eliminate the evil agents.

Can you discover the sinister secret in Escape from Bytesville?
